
= Definition =

GolfML is the root element of the Golf Markup Language.

= Elements =

GolfML has 4 elements:

 # [Players?]
 # GolfCourses
 # Tournaments
 # [Applications]

= Attributes =

 # Version

Version of the definition of Golf Markup Language. Must be 3 integer numbers separated by period.

= Notes =

The content of Tournaments is currently undefined.
